attributes.action: I want to change my vote to Remain
attributes.additional_details: It is already clear some of the pledges made by the Leave campaign are not delieverable. There are many people who regret their decision. The government do not have a mandate to invoke Article 50 as those voting were voting based on false information.
attributes.background: I voted leave in the EU referendum. Having had a chance to consider I wish to change my vote.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
